sentences.en: ...without access to any services such as water or sewerage.
sentences.cn: ...不能享受任何如供水或污水处理的服务。

sentences.en: Ash and elm trees lined the streets , all of which had a sewerage system.
sentences.cn: 道路两旁种有青槐和榆树, 并有相当完整的排水系统.

sentences.en: It is supposed to be washed down the gutter and into the city's vast sewerage system.
sentences.cn: 它应该是被沿排水沟冲入城市庞大的排水系统。

sentences.en: One heavy storm can cause ageing urban sewerage systems to overflow.
sentences.cn: 一场大暴雨就使城市下水道脏水外溢.
排水系统有 “ 分流制 ” 和 “ 合流制”.

sentences.en: Sludge disposal facilities should be installed for the need of sewerage treatment.
sentences.cn: 同时配套建设完善污泥处置系统.

sentences.en: The acid waste waters are discharged into a sump or the sewerage system.
sentences.cn: 酸性废水被送往销毁池或阴沟系统.

sentences.en: The pollutants that affect water come mainly from industries, farm, and sewerage systems.
sentences.cn: 水的污染源主要来自工业 、 农场以及排水系统.

sentences.en: The temporary sewerage pump was installed to pump the sewerage water drain to reduce the overflow.
sentences.cn: 当局已经安装临时的排污泵在该处以减少污水的溢出.

sentences.en: Unfortunately, the sewerage was not the only issue.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是, 污水并不是唯一的问题.

words.tran_cn: 为…铺设污水管道；用下水道排除…的污水

phrases.tran_cn: 排水系统；污水工程系统

trans.tran_en: the system by which waste material and used water are carried away in sewers and then treated to stop it being harmful
